statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, category, sales_count FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM Inventory WHERE sales_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_count FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY sales_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Inventory WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, sales_count, demand_forecast FROM Inventory WHERE demand_forecast BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC, sales_count ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_count FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY sales_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, category, demand_forecast FROM Inventory WHERE sales_count < 50 ORDER BY category DESC, demand_forecast ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price, quantity_sold FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity, sale_date FROM products LEFT JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, reorder_level FROM product_inventory ORDER BY reorder_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level, reorder_level FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY inventory_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level < reorder_level ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_inventory WHERE inventory_level > 50 AND reorder_level < 20 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM product_inventory JOIN sales_data ON product_inventory.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM product_inventory JOIN demand_forecast ON product_inventory.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_quantity > 200 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level, reorder_level FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%' AND inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY reorder_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_quantity >= 50 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, total_sales_amount FROM sales INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE fulfilled = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity <= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND quantity > 50;
SELECT products.product_name, sales.sale_date, sales.sale_amount FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.fulfilled FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.fulfilled = TRUE ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
